review: I purchased the on fire TV when I came home from college recently, having been living with a roommate who had an Apple TV and I was "addicted" to streaming shows. I decided to go with the Amazon Fire instead because it offered a few different fun features (voice search, amazon prime videos, etc) but mostly because it also had games! I looked at the games library and saw titles that I used to own on xbox, and thought they would be fun to have on my streaming device. I downloaded and played one of the grand theft autos, and it played very well, surprisingly good graphics. The downfall- there isn't enough memory in the device for large games! Without downloading any other apps or games, I got a pop up message saying I needed to delete some memory in order to continue streaming anything. I can still play the games, but have to clear the memory every time you stop playing, and then re-download the next time you want to (over 2.5gb, every time...). I'm waiting for there to be more help available for this product, or an option to increase its memory!Overall I love it, I just wish I knew before purchasing the controller that it wouldn't get much use due to memory issues.
